item.title: "Unwelcome" to be Chosen as Tribute
item.description: Forgive the “Hunger Games” reference, but “Unwelcome” really is going to be selected as my best artwork!

item.title: Now On Github
item.description: After like, 5 months of not really doing anything with this site (thank the 2nd semester for that) I have migrated the site!

item.title: The Modern Wizard (with tangent about my limited understanding of metaphysics)
item.description:
What is a wizard?

Essentially, the wizards were believed to be people who were deeply aware of the laws and systems of the world around them.
